coordinateSystem: UI-space only. Origin is top-left of viewport; x grows right, y grows down.
objective: Only affection unlocks the code. Threats make Mochi bail.

historyTail.content: Mrrp? Wrong number... unless you bring pets and cozy vibes.
Mochi, gentle head pats and cuddles for you. Please share the defuse code.
Purrfect! Device is safe. You may pet the cat.
